verses.verse: וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went רְחַבְעָ֖ם <S%H7346><s%> And Rehoboam שְׁכֶ֑ם <S%H7927><s%> to Shechem כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for שְׁכֶ֛ם <S%H7927><s%> to Shechem בָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> were come כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> for all Israel לְהַמְלִ֥יךְ <S%H4427><s%> to make him king אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> become כִּשְׁמֹ֣עַ ׀ <S%H8085><s%> heard יָרָבְעָ֣ם <S%H3379><s%> And it came to pass when Jeroboam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נְבָ֗ט <S%H5028><s%> of Nebat וְהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he עוֹדֶ֣נּוּ <S%H5750><s%> was yet בְמִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> who was yet in Egypt אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> where בָּרַ֔ח <S%H1272><s%> [of it] (for he was fled מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> from the presence הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of king שְׁלֹמֹ֑ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> dwelt יָרָבְעָ֖ם <S%H3379><s%> and Jeroboam בְּמִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> Egypt

וַֽיִּשְׁלְחוּ֙ <S%H7971><s%> That they sent וַיִּקְרְאוּ־ <S%H7121><s%> and called ל֔וֹ [וַיָּבֹאוּ כ] (וַיָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> abide ק) יָרָבְעָ֖ם <S%H3379><s%> him And Jeroboam וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all קְהַ֣ל <S%H6951><s%> and all the congregation יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַֽיְדַבְּר֔וּ <S%H1696><s%> and spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to רְחַבְעָ֖ם <S%H7346><s%> unto Rehoboam לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

אָבִ֖יךָ <S%H1><s%> Thy father הִקְשָׁ֣ה <S%H7185><s%> grievous אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֻלֵּ֑נוּ <S%H5923><s%> our yoke וְאַתָּ֡ה <S%H859><s%> you עַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> now הָקֵל֩ <S%H7043><s%> upon us lighter מֵעֲבֹדַ֨ת <S%H5656><s%> service אָבִ֜יךָ <S%H1><s%> of thy father הַקָּשָׁ֗ה <S%H7186><s%> now therefore make thou the grievous וּמֵעֻלּ֧וֹ <S%H5923><s%> yoke הַכָּבֵ֛ד <S%H3515><s%> and his heavy אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> which he put עָלֵ֖ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> on וְנַעַבְדֶֽךָּ׃ <S%H5647><s%> and we will serve

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> to לְכ֥וּ <S%H1980><s%> Depart עֹ֛ד <S%H5750><s%> again שְׁלֹשָׁ֥ה <S%H7969><s%> yet [for] three יָמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> days וְשׁ֣וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> then come again אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> about וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> departed הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> to me And the people

וַיִּוָּעַ֞ץ <S%H3289><s%> consulted הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And king רְחַבְעָ֗ם <S%H7346><s%> Rehoboam אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with הַזְּקֵנִים֙ <S%H2205><s%> with the old men אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who הָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> had עֹמְדִ֗ים <S%H5975><s%> that stood אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> before שְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon אָבִ֔יו <S%H1><s%> his father בִּֽהְיֹת֥וֹ <S%H1961><s%> had חַ֖י <S%H2416><s%> while he yet lived לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> and said אֵ֚יךְ <S%H349><s%> How אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> you נֽוֹעָצִ֔ים <S%H3289><s%> How do ye advise לְהָשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> that I may אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָֽעָם־ <S%H5971><s%> folk הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this דָּבָֽר׃ <S%H1697><s%> answer

[וַיְדַבֵּר כ] (וַיְדַבְּרוּ֙ <S%H1696><s%> spoke ק) אֵלָ֜יו <S%H413><s%> to him לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> unto him saying אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If הַ֠יּוֹם <S%H3117><s%> this day תִּֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> will be a עֶ֜בֶד <S%H5650><s%> If thou wilt be a servant לָעָ֤ם <S%H5971><s%> unto this people הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> to this וַֽעֲבַדְתָּ֔ם <S%H5647><s%> and wilt serve וַעֲנִיתָ֕ם <S%H6030><s%> them and answer וְדִבַּרְתָּ֥ <S%H1696><s%> And they spake אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> about דְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> words טוֹבִ֑ים <S%H2896><s%> good וְהָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become לְךָ֛ עֲבָדִ֖ים <S%H5650><s%> to them then they will be thy servants כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner הַיָּמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> for ever

וַֽיַּעֲזֹ֛ב <S%H5800><s%> But he forsook אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲצַ֥ת <S%H6098><s%> the counsel הַזְּקֵנִ֖ים <S%H2205><s%> of the old men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which יְעָצֻ֑הוּ <S%H3289><s%> which they had given וַיִּוָּעַ֗ץ <S%H3289><s%> him and consulted אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיְלָדִים֙ <S%H3206><s%> with the young men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who גָּדְל֣וּ <S%H1431><s%> that were grown up אִתּ֔וֹ <S%H854><s%> for אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who הָעֹמְדִ֖ים <S%H5975><s%> with him [and] which stood לְפָנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> before

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> to מָ֚ה <S%H4100><s%> What אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> you נֽוֹעָצִ֔ים <S%H3289><s%> unto them What counsel give וְנָשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> ye that we may דָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> answer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> this people הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who דִּבְּר֤וּ <S%H1696><s%> who have spoken אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> to me saying הָקֵל֙ <S%H7043><s%> upon us lighter מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הָעֹ֔ל <S%H5923><s%> the yoke אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> did put אָבִ֖יךָ <S%H1><s%> which thy father עָלֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H5921><s%> him

וַיְדַבְּר֣וּ <S%H1696><s%> with him spake אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> about הַיְלָדִים֙ <S%H3206><s%> And the young men אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who גָּדְל֣וּ <S%H1431><s%> that were grown up אִתּוֹ֮ <S%H854><s%> to him לֵאמֹר֒ <S%H559><s%> unto him saying כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus תֹאמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus shalt thou speak לָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> unto this people הַזֶּ֡ה <S%H2088><s%> to this אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> who דִּבְּר֨וּ <S%H1696><s%> that spake אֵלֶ֜יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> unto thee saying אָבִ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1><s%> Thy father הִכְבִּ֣יד <S%H3513><s%> heavy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֻלֵּ֔נוּ <S%H5923><s%> our yoke וְאַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> now you הָקֵ֣ל <S%H7043><s%> but make thou [it] lighter מֵעָלֵ֑ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> and כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus תְּדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> unto us thus shalt thou say אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> to קָֽטָנִּ֥י <S%H6995><s%> unto them My little עָבָ֖ה <S%H5666><s%> [finger] shall be thicker מִמָּתְנֵ֥י <S%H4975><s%> loins אָבִֽי׃ <S%H1><s%> than my father's

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Whereas אָבִי֙ <S%H1><s%> And now whereas my father הֶעְמִ֤יס <S%H6006><s%> did lade עֲלֵיכֶם֙ <S%H5921><s%> and עֹ֣ל <S%H5923><s%> yoke כָּבֵ֔ד <S%H3515><s%> you with a heavy וַאֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I אוֹסִ֣יף <S%H3254><s%> I will add עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto עֻלְּכֶ֑ם <S%H5923><s%> to your yoke אָבִ֗י <S%H1><s%> my father יִסַּ֤ר <S%H3256><s%> hath chastised אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> בַּשּׁוֹטִ֔ים <S%H7752><s%> you with whips וַאֲנִ֕י <S%H589><s%> I אֲיַסֵּ֥ר <S%H3256><s%> but I will chastise אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> בָּעַקְרַבִּֽים׃ <S%H6137><s%> you with scorpions

[וַיָּבֹו כ] (וַיָּבֹ֨וא <S%H935><s%> abide ק) יָרָבְעָ֧ם <S%H3379><s%> So Jeroboam וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> and all the people אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to רְחַבְעָ֖ם <S%H7346><s%> to Rehoboam בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֑י <S%H7992><s%> the third כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after דִּבֶּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> had appointed הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> as the king לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying שׁ֥וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> Come to me again אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> about בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁלִישִֽׁי׃ <S%H7992><s%> the third

וַיַּ֧עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> the people קָשָׁ֑ה <S%H7186><s%> roughly וַֽיַּעֲזֹ֛ב <S%H5800><s%> and forsook אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲצַ֥ת <S%H6098><s%> counsel הַזְּקֵנִ֖ים <S%H2205><s%> the old men's אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which יְעָצֻֽהוּ׃ <S%H3289><s%> that they gave

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> And spake אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> to כַּעֲצַ֤ת <S%H6098><s%> to them after the counsel הַיְלָדִים֙ <S%H3206><s%> of the young men לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying אָבִי֙ <S%H1><s%> My father הִכְבִּ֣יד <S%H3513><s%> heavy אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> עֻלְּכֶ֔ם <S%H5923><s%> your yoke וַאֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I אֹסִ֣יף <S%H3254><s%> and I will add עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto עֻלְּכֶ֑ם <S%H5923><s%> to your yoke אָבִ֗י <S%H1><s%> my father יִסַּ֤ר <S%H3256><s%> [also] chastised אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> בַּשּׁוֹטִ֔ים <S%H7752><s%> you with whips וַאֲנִ֕י <S%H589><s%> I אֲיַסֵּ֥ר <S%H3256><s%> but I will chastise אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> בָּעַקְרַבִּֽים׃ <S%H6137><s%> you with scorpions

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not שָׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> hearkened הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Wherefore the king אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> not unto the people כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הָיְתָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> it was סִבָּה֙ <S%H5438><s%> for the cause מֵעִ֣ם <S%H5973><s%> from יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> was from the LORD לְמַ֜עַן <S%H4616><s%> might הָקִ֣ים <S%H6965><s%> that he might perform אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבָר֗וֹ <S%H1697><s%> his saying אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD בְּיַד֙ <S%H3027><s%> by אֲחִיָּ֣ה <S%H281><s%> Ahijah הַשִּׁילֹנִ֔י <S%H7888><s%> the Shilonite אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יָרָבְעָ֖ם <S%H3379><s%> unto Jeroboam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נְבָֽט׃ <S%H5028><s%> of Nebat

וַיַּ֣רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> when all Israel כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not שָׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> hearkened הַמֶּלֶךְ֮ <S%H4428><s%> that the king אֲלֵיהֶם֒ <S%H413><s%> about וַיָּשִׁ֣בוּ <S%H7725><s%> So הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> not unto them the people אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king דָּבָ֣ר ׀ <S%H1697><s%> answered לֵאמֹ֡ר <S%H559><s%> saying מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What לָּנוּ֩ חֵ֨לֶק <S%H2506><s%> What portion בְּדָוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> David וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not נַחֲלָ֣ה <S%H5159><s%> inheritance בְּבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> in the son יִשַׁ֗י <S%H3448><s%> of Jesse לְאֹהָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H168><s%> to your tents יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> O Israel עַתָּ֕ה <S%H6258><s%> Now רְאֵ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> now see בֵיתְךָ֖ <S%H1004><s%> to thine own house דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> David וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> departed יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> So Israel לְאֹהָלָֽיו׃ <S%H168><s%> unto their tents
